com.samsung.android.sdk.accessoryfiletransfer

Interface SAFileTransfer.EventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SAFileTransfer

    public static interface SAFileTransfer.EventListener
    This listener interface receives file transfer update events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onProgressChanged(int transactionId, int progress)
      Called when the transfer progress changes.
      void onTransferCompleted(int transactionId, String fileName, int errorCode)
      Called by the File Transfer Service utility when the file transfer completes.
      void onTransferRequested(int transactionId, String fileName)
      Called on the receiver side when the sending application sends a file transfer request.

    • Method Detail

      • onTransferRequested

        void onTransferRequested(int transactionId,
                       String fileName)
        Called on the receiver side when the sending application sends a file transfer request. The receiver must be registered beforehand for the File Transfer Service to receive this callback
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The transaction id for the incoming file transfer request
        fileName - The fully qualified file name of the incoming file transfer
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • onProgressChanged

        void onProgressChanged(int transactionId,
                     int progress)
        Called when the transfer progress changes. This callback occurs on both the sender and receiver end
        Parameters:
        transactionId - Transaction id of the file transfer
        progress - Progress in percentage
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • onTransferCompleted

        void onTransferCompleted(int transactionId,
                       String fileName,
                       int errorCode)
        Called by the File Transfer Service utility when the file transfer completes. This callback indicates the completion of the file transfer at either side
        Parameters:
        transactionId - Transaction id of the file transfer request
        fileName - Path where the sent/received file is stored
        errorCode - The error code for the file transfer, with SAFileTransfer.ERROR_NONE indicating success
        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        SAFileTransfer.ERROR_NONE, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_CHANNEL_IO, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_FILE_IO, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_COMMAND_DROPPED, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_CONNECTION_LOST, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_PEER_AGENT_BUSY, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_PEER_AGENT_REJECTED, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_SPACE_NOT_AVAILABLE, SAFileTransfer.ERROR_PEER_AGENT_NO_RESPONSE
